list.name: (start)
list.query: select text,generatorHost,application,title FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*started$/ GROUP BY generatorHost,application,title)

list.name: (stop)
list.query: select "text", "generatorHost", "application" FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*ended$/ GROUP BY  "generatorHost", "application")

targets.query:
SELECT "host", top("factor", 1) FROM
(SELECT (sum("duration_sum")*sum("calls_sum")) as "factor" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)

SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/.*${filter:regex}.*/ AND  $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)

SELECT "Calls", top(${TOP_by}, ${TOP}), "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/${filter:regex}/  AND $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/)  AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)

SELECT "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Max","Mean" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", max("max_time") AS "Max", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", max("max_time") AS "Max", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
)
WHERE "Calls">0 AND Total>=0 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: PostgreSQL host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")
list.label: PostgreSQL DB
list.name: datname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "usename")
list.label: PostgreSQL User
list.name: usename
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "usename")

list.definition:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)
list.label: query_md5
list.name: query_md5
list.query:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10min" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)
